content: a11, thank you for responding. I hear you. You are fighting the good fight it sounds like. I think we differ in opinion on chemotherapy as my research has found it to be both cancer causing and immune system depleting. And yes, western medicine absolutely has its place and thank God. But because much of their training comes from the drug companies who control even the medical teaching facilities, all of their practices must be screened with a jaded eye. Cheers and best of luck.
